Title: Wir können auch anders...
Writer: Detlev Buck, Ernst Kahl (book), Ernst Kahl (screenplay)
Actors: Joachim Król, Horst Krause, Konstantin Kotljarov, Sophie Rois
Plot: Two brothers both of which can neither read nor write making their way across Germany in order to claim to their inheritance. On their way they meet Viktor, a deserted soldier of the sowjet red army and Nadine, a beautiful young woman. Later an incident with some highwaymen, which can be solved easily with Viktor's kalashnikov, they become accused for murder - something they had neither intended nor realized. They claim Nadine to be their hostage, fleeing police forces until they reach the coast.
